skills.skill: Microsoft Word, Excel, Outlook, and IRMA

duties_responsibilities.duty: Verify and confirm the integrity of product deliveries against Purchase Orders and supplier paperwork.
Processing and filing invoices, including invoice distribution to appropriate teams.
Accurate closing of purchase orders and adherence to Receiving standards.
Supporting product Teams with accounting processes during inventory and financial period close.
Maintaining environmental areas and equipment in proper working order, including working with heavy machinery.
Providing courteous, friendly, and efficient service to customers and Team Members at all times.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
